pullrequest.title: Fix for properly including GDAL headers on non-ubuntu systems

content.raw: I find the [meld](http://meldmerge.org/) tool to be very useful for resolving conflicts. Install meld and set the environment variable `HGMERGE=meld` before the `hg merge` command, and it will open the meld window. The make the appropriate changes so that the content in all three panes is the same, hit save, and exit.
content.html: I find the meld tool to be very useful for resolving conflicts. Install meld and set the environment variable HGMERGE=meld before the hg merge command, and it will open the meld window. The make the appropriate changes so that the content in all three panes is the same, hit save, and exit.
